_sText:
Mg_fighting_pigs - A simple funny map where "SUPER PIGS" (read. flying pigs) are attacking players by throwing grenades :) Players must survive 45 sec, after 45 seconds all players will be equiped with KNIFE AND GRENADE.
There is a Deagle and Scout. FIXES: - Deleted all physics objects - Better FPS If you want help, please post whih mod crashes map. Have fun!
